verses.roman:
ei ta' kariluṅ ṣaṣṭha ślokera vyākhyāna
śrī-rūpa-gosāñira pāda-padma kari' dhyāna

synonyms: ei ta'-thus; kariluṅ—I have made; ṣaṣṭha ślokera—of the sixth verse; vyākhyāna—explanation; śrī-rūpa—Śrīla Rūpa Gosvāmī; gosāñira—of the master; pāda-padma—lotus feet; kari'-doing; dhyāna—meditation.
translation: Meditating on the lotus feet of Śrī Rūpa Gosvāmī, I have thus explained the sixth verse.
